responses.rationale: Reports absence of human-to-human transmission, but lacks explicit calming language or intensified low-risk framing.
Provides advice on avoiding exposure; does not contain explicit calming language.
States 'risks currently being low' but lacks intensification (e.g., 'very low') or other explicit calming cues.
Stresses importance of following recommendations; does not contain explicit calming language about current safety.
Reports historical fatality rate; does not contain explicit calming language.
Lists symptoms; does not contain explicit calming language.
Describes a patient's symptom; does not contain explicit calming language.
Describes recommendations for healthcare workers; does not contain explicit calming language for the public.
States 'risks to the general public remain low' but lacks intensification (e.g., 'very low') or other explicit calming cues.
Recommends PPE; does not contain explicit calming language.
Recommends PPE to lower risk; does not contain explicit calming language.
Reports CDC alert and source of infection; does not contain explicit calming language.
Reports a historical case; does not contain explicit calming language.
Reports a new case; does not contain explicit calming language.
Reports CDC issuing an alert; does not contain explicit calming language.
Discusses raw milk regulations; does not contain explicit calming language.
Discusses social media content; does not contain explicit calming language.
Links raw milk to other diseases; does not contain explicit calming language.
Reports consumption statistics; does not contain explicit calming language.
Reports absence of human-to-human transmission; lacks explicit calming language or intensified low-risk framing.
Reports cat deaths; does not contain explicit calming language.
Reports historical human fatality rate; does not contain explicit calming language.
Reports import restrictions and testing; does not contain explicit calming language.
Reports FDA finding trace amounts; does not contain explicit calming language.
Reports spread to a person and herd cases; does not contain explicit calming language.
Correction note; does not contain explicit calming language.
Correction note; does not contain explicit calming language.
States cooking kills pathogens; does not use the keyword 'safe' and is a bare statement of fact about a condition for safety.
States cases 'do not present an immediate public health concern'; this is a bare negation without explicit calming amplification.
Reports spread in wild birds; does not contain explicit calming language.
Explains spread mechanism; does not contain explicit calming language.

Reports latest cases on farms; does not contain explicit calming language.

Reports egg production and chicken numbers; does not contain explicit calming language.
Reports cases and birds killed in Iowa; does not contain explicit calming language.
Reports total birds killed nationally; does not contain explicit calming language.
